sense.name: 开放, open
sense.commentary: open to public use, or open to traffic.
sense.examples:
这个酒店已向客人开放。 The hotel is now open to guests.
该诊所对职工，家属， 及公众开放。 The clinic is open to out siders as well as employees and their families.
开放城市。 the open cities.

sense.name: 开放， bloom
sense.commentary: aflower, or the condition of having flowers.
sense.examples:
玫瑰已经开放。 The roses have come into bloom.
花开放时很美。 Flowers in bloom are a beutiful sight.
